titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (SPECIAL QUESTIONS QUESTION B) - Description

div.p: TPRG-SEND TWO YEAR CORRECTED AGE OUTCOME ASSESSMENT SCORE (SPECIAL QUESTIONS QUESTION B) is the PERSON SCORE for question B of the Special Questions section of the TPRG-SEND Two Year Corrected Age Outcome Assessment.
The question asks "Was this child difficult to test?".
If the response is 'Yes' then CHILD DIFFICULT TO TEST REASON CODE should be completed.
